ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ la pú ńcúʼte Shʉlo, ńkwɛ́ ntàb mbumté wó. Epʉ̀a ngwòŋ Kánàhan lɔ́ɔn ńcʉ́ʼʉ ńjúʼu pɔ́ ncwò pɔ́b.
en: The entire Israelite community assembled at Shiloh   and set up the tent of meeting there. The land had been subdued before them,

ngiemboon: Mengẅɛ̀te sɔɔnmbʉ́a na mengẅɛ̀te púɔ Ésàlayɛ la nyé te gẅiin wɔ́b tÿɔgɔ́.
en: but seven tribes among the Israelites were left who had not divided up their inheritance.

ngiemboon: Yǒonshûa gɔɔn mbwó pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ ngie: «Pi ée páʼɔɔn, é láʼ gwágte nò na lekẅě ngwòŋ gẅie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, é Ssé metá pí, la ná né pi, tà kú pɔ́ síŋe?
en: So Joshua asked the Israelites, “How long will you delay going out to take possession of the land that the Lord, the God of your ancestors, gave you?

ngiemboon: Pi gʉa tsɛ̀ɛ yɛ̌ yɛ̌ ngẅɛ̀te wɔ́ɔ, ńtsɔ́ʼ mbàŋa yétá. Ńzsé ngie n ge gÿo túmo wɔ́b, pɔ́ gwá ńkʉ́ʼʉ tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ. Pɔ́ ge kʉ́ʼʉ púʼu, ayɛ̌ nùɔ wɔ́ɔ líe páʼ wé tÿɔgɔ́ gwɔ́, é ŋweʼe, é lɔg tó, é ná né mèŋ.
en: Appoint for yourselves three men from each tribe, and I will send them out. They are to go and survey the land, write a description of it for the purpose of their inheritance, and return to me.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ ge gÿo shʉ́ate ngwòŋ nzsè sɔɔnmbʉ́a, é gabte tsetsɛ̀ɛ pɔ́b. Epʉ̀a pe ngẅɛ̀te Yúndà ge gÿo gẅiin yɔ́b pàga láʼ, á shÿó ntsíŋ. Epʉ̀a pe ngẅɛ̀te Yesyɛ̂b gẅiin yɔ́b tàa shÿó twó kwóŋ.
en: Then they are to divide it into seven portions. Judah is to remain in its territory in the south and Joseph’s family in their territory in the north.

ngiemboon: Ńgʉa na pi, mbà pi ge shʉ́ate ngwòŋ nzsè sɔɔnmbʉ́a, é ŋweʼe lɔg tó, é ná né mèŋ, m maʼa tyèente, tá ńdɔg ńgaba mbwó pi, pɔ́ jʉʼɔɔn, á mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, é Ssé yege.
en: When you have written a description of the seven portions of land and brought it to me, I will cast lots   for you here in the presence of the Lord our God.  # 18:6 Jos 14:2

ngiemboon: Mé ge gÿo cʉ́ʼʉ légab tÿɔgɔ́, mé le ná we pʉ̀a ngẅɛ̀te Lěvî pie ée tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi wɔ́. Ńtí nue lefaʼa mbwó Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, zɔ lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ wɔ́b tÿɔgɔ́. Mǒonsê, ngàŋafàʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ka ná tÿɔgɔ́ we Ngâd pɔ́ Lẅímbèŋ, ńgÿo gwoŋó ngẅɛ̀te Manase, á shÿó sǎʼnèm, á na yetsɔ̌ nzǐŋ ntse Juundʉŋ.»
en: But the Levites among you do not get a portion, because their inheritance is the priesthood of the Lord.   Gad, Reuben, and half the tribe of Manasseh have taken their inheritance beyond the Jordan to the east, which Moses the Lord’s servant gave them.”

ngiemboon: Yǒonshûa gɔɔn púʼu, embàŋa gie mé tsɔ̌ʼ légwɔ́ gie pɔ́ gwá ńkʉ́ʼʉ, ńgyá páʼ jʉʼ ée tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ ńgwɔ́, ńŋweʼe, é gʉa; ńgwaa gʉa, á tsẅi né pɔ́b ngie: «Pi gʉa, ńgwá ńkʉ́ʼʉ, ńgyá páʼ jʉʼ ée tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ ńgwɔ́, ńŋweʼe, ńdɔg ńtó ńná né mèŋ. N deen ńké ńtyé mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, á Shʉlo jʉʼɔɔn, ḿmaʼa tyèente, ńdɔg ńgabte, ńná né pi.»
en: As the men prepared to go, Joshua commanded them   to write down a description of the land, saying, “Go and survey the land, write a description of it, and return to me. I will then cast lots for you here in Shiloh in the presence of the Lord.”

ngiemboon: Mbàŋa ŋwɛ́ gwá ńkʉ́ʼʉ tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ, éshʉ́ate ngwòŋ nzsè sɔɔnmbʉ́a, ńŋweʼe tsɛ̀ɛ ŋwàʼne, ńcʉ́ʼʉ léshʉ́ate, ńdɔg metÿǒsoŋ, éshʉ́ate. Ńdeen ńké ḿbiŋ nzèm, ńtsɛ́ɛ Yǒonshûa, á shʉlo, á jʉʼʉ mentàb.
en: So the men left, went through the land, and described it by towns in a document of seven sections. They returned to Joshua at the camp in Shiloh.

ngiemboon: Yǒonshûa leen ńké, ńtyé mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, á Shʉlo, ḿmaʼa tyèente, ńdɔg ńgabte ngwòŋ, ńnáa mbwó pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ, ńcʉ́ʼʉ légabte, ńdɔg mengẅɛ̀te mɔ́b, ńgabte.
en: Joshua cast lots for them at Shiloh in the presence of the Lord where he distributed the land to the Israelites according to their divisions.

ngiemboon: Ndùŋmvfò pàga láʼ gie mé la maʼa tyèente, ḿbí, á la kẅɛɛ ye pʉ̀a ngẅɛ̀te Mbɛŋjÿamɛŋ, mé cʉ́ʼʉ légabte, ńdɔg menkenkÿo tsìŋendá, ńgabte. Ayɔ́b jʉʼ gie mé la ná, ée shʉ̀a gie ée tsetsɛ̀ɛ jʉʼ ye gubé Yúndà pɔ́ ye gubé Yesyɛ̂b.
en: The lot came up for the tribe of Benjamin’s descendants by their clans, and their allotted territory lay between Judah’s descendants and Joseph’s descendants.

ngiemboon: Á la gʉa shÿó kwóŋ, ndège pàga láʼa yɔ́b, é gwɔ́ nkʉ̀ŋ ntse Juundʉŋ. Ńdɔg ḿbʉ ńkúu shÿó kwóŋ Yelíkò; ḿbiŋ kwɔ́ʼ ńdɔg ye tsɛ̀ɛ mekwɛ́, á shÿó mbyěnèm; ńdeen ńké ńcʉ́me nkùɔmekwaʼá Mbɛ́d-Aveŋ.
en: Their border on the north side began at the Jordan, ascended to the slope of Jericho on the north, through the hill country westward, and ended at the wilderness around Beth-aven.

ngiemboon: Ndège láʼ la fó jʉʼó, ńgʉa gʉa ńkúu nkwɔʼɔ́ shÿó ntsíŋ Lûuzè (Lûuzè lɔgɔ ńgɔɔn ngie «Mbetɛɛ»); ńgíŋe ńcwóŋ ńdɔg ye Atolɔd-Andâa, á ndùm lekwɛ́ sie ée shÿó ntsíŋ Mbɛ́d-Oloŋ we ntsíŋ.
en: From there the border went toward Luz, to the southern slope of Luz (that is, Bethel); it then went down by Ataroth-addar, over the hill south of Lower Beth-horon.

ngiemboon: Ńgʉa na shÿó mbyěnèm, ndège láʼ, é cwóŋ ńtʉ́ŋe na nkwɔʼɔ́ ntse máŋʉ́, á shÿó ntsíŋ, léfó lekwɔʼɔ́ sie é líe Mbɛ́d-Oloŋ we ntsíŋ, ńcʉ́me Kiliyád-Mbâa (Kiliyád-Mbâa à lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ Kiliyád-Yeyalim), á tÿǒsoŋo penkʉ́ Yúndà pembàŋa. Wɔɔn aa páʼ gwoŋó shÿó mbyěnèm lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́.
en: On the west side, from the hill facing Beth-horon on the south, the border curved, turning southward, and ended at Kiriath-baal (that is, Kiriath-jearim), a city of the descendants of Judah. This was the west side of their border.

ngiemboon: Ńgʉa shÿó ntsíŋ, ndège láʼ zyete Kiliyád-Yeyalim, ńgʉa ńkúu mbyěnèm, ńcʉ́me jʉʼʉ mesáʼa ntse Nɛbtowa.
en: The south side began at the edge of Kiriath-jearim, and the border extended westward; it went to the spring at the Waters of Nephtoah.

ngiemboon: Endège láʼ la fó wó ńcwóŋ, ńkúu nzsòte lekwɛ́ sie é líe fúʼu gubé Enom; á tsɛ̀ɛ fúʼu pʉ̀a Lefa á twó kwóŋ, ńcwóŋ ye fúʼu Enom, á nkwɔʼɔ́ pʉ̀a Yembúsè, á shÿó ntsíŋ, ńgíŋe ńcwóŋ tà ńkúu Eyiŋ-Longɛ̂ɛ.
en: The border descended to the foot of the hill that faces Ben Hinnom Valley at the northern end of Rephaim Valley. It ran down Hinnom Valley toward the south Jebusite slope and downward to En-rogel.

ngiemboon: Éfó wó, ńtʉ́ŋe ye shÿó kwóŋ, ńgʉa ńcʉ́me Eyiŋ-shÿemɛ́shÿè, Ńdɔg ye Ngelilɔd gẅie à líe lekwɔʼɔ́ Andummim, éfó wó ńcwóŋ ńdɔg ye jʉʼʉ tóon Mbohaŋ, míŋ Lẅímbèŋ.
en: It curved northward and went to En-shemesh and on to Geliloth, which is opposite the Ascent of Adummim, and continued down to the Stone of Bohan   son of Reuben.

ngiemboon: Éfó wó, ńcʉa ye nkwɔʼɔ́ lekwɛ́ twó kwóŋ sie é lélíe kwòŋo témmó, ńgíŋe fó wó, ńcwóŋ ńdɔg ye kwòŋo témmó.
en: Then it went north to the slope opposite the Arabah   and proceeded into the plains.  # 18:18 Or the Arabah

ngiemboon: Endège láʼ cʉa nkwɔʼɔ́ Mbɛ́d-Ɔgla á shÿó kwóŋ, ḿbiŋ fó wó, ńgʉa tà ńkúu jʉʼ gie tàʼ ntse Juundʉŋ cʉ́me wó tsɛ̀ɛ máŋʉ́ Ngwáŋ á shÿó kwóŋ, ńgʉa ńkúu fúʼu ntse Juundʉŋ, á shÿó ntsíŋ. Yɔɔn lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ ndège láʼ, á shÿó ntsíŋ.
en: The border continued to the north slope of Beth-hoglah and ended at the northern bay of the Dead Sea, at the southern end of the Jordan. This was the southern border.

ngiemboon: Ńgʉa shÿó sǎʼnèm, entse Juundʉŋ, lɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ ndège láʼ. Mɔɔn lɔgɔ páʼɔɔn ḿbú ńgwɔ́ mendège láʼ mie é pú ńkéle tÿɔgɔ́ pʉ̀a ngẅɛ̀te Mbɛŋjÿamɛŋ, á na menkenkÿo tsìŋendá.
en: The Jordan formed the border on the east side.

ngiemboon: Metÿǒsoŋ mengẅɛ̀te gubé Mbɛŋjÿamɛŋ na menkenkÿo tsìŋendá, emɔɔn: yɔɔn áa tÿǒsoŋo Yelíkò, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Mbɛ́d-Ɔgla, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Emɛ́g-Kesitse,
en: These were the cities of the tribe of Benjamin’s descendants by their clans:

ngiemboon: yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Mbɛ́d-Alamba, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Tsemalayîm, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Mbetɛɛ,
en: Beth-arabah, Zemaraim, Bethel,

ngiemboon: yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye pʉ̀a Avitɛ́sè, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Pala, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Ɔfela,
en: Avvim, Parah, Ophrah,

ngiemboon: yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Shÿefaa-Amoni, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Ɔfeni, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye ngimbeya, é lɔgɔ ḿbú ńgwɔ́ metÿǒsoŋ ntsɔ̀b pʉ́a lé legém, tá ńgÿo meláʼ mie é tswéʼe mǒ.
en: Chephar-ammoni, Ophni, and Geba #— #twelve cities, with their settlements;

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn la gíŋe ńgwɔ́ tÿǒsoŋo Ngambahoŋ, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Lama, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Mbɛlɔd,
en: Gibeon, Ramah, Beeroth,

ngiemboon: yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Misepe, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Kefila, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Motsa,
en: Mizpeh, Chephirah, Mozah,

ngiemboon: yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Lekɛ̂m, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Yipɛ̂ɛ, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Taleyala,
en: Rekem, Irpeel, Taralah,

ngiemboon: yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Tsela, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Elɛb, yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Yembúsè (Yembúsè lɔgɔ ńgɔɔn ngie Yelúzálèm), yɔɔn gwɔ́ ye Ngimbeya ńgÿo ye Kiliyád-Yalim: É lɔgɔ ḿbú ńgwɔ́ metÿǒsoŋ ntsɔ̀b lekùɔ lé legém, tá ńgÿo meláʼ mie é tswéʼe mǒ.
en: Zela, Haeleph, Jebus   (that is, Jerusalem), Gibeah, and Kiriath  # 18:28 LXX, Syr read Kiriath-jearim  #— #fourteen cities, with their settlements.
